Pre-Game Insights: Australia needs a victory against a strong South African team to prevent their World Cup campaign from requiring life support just a week into the tournament.
South Africa boasts what is arguably the most powerful batting line-up in all of cricket.
A shallow Australian bowling attack will be put to the test.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will start at 9:30am UK time.
You can watch the match live on Sky Sports Cricket and Main Event from 9am.
Sky Sports customers can live stream the match via the Sky Go app.
Others: Adam Zampa will be required to send down 10 overs against a Saffa batting line-up that is as powerful as any in world cricket.
Adam Zampa has a serious task on his hands after less than a month ago the same batting line-up smashed Zampa for a record-equaling 113 runs from his 10 overs.
